long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension connects your Google Chrome with CommPeak's PBX, allowing you to click-to-call on phone numbers in web pages. You can select any phone number on any page, right click on it and you will see magic "CommPeak Click2Call" item in context menu which will simply dial to selected number.
